Project Summary
---------------

A cosmetics and beauty company is seeking an AI enablement specialist to lead agentic workflow adoption and change management across their product and marketing teams. This is a part-time advisory role focused on prompt engineering excellence and training delivery.

Key aspects of the engagement:
- Part-time capacity (2-3 days per week)
- Hybrid work model with periodic onsite workshops in Tokyo

Responsibilities
----------------
- Design and implement agentic workflows for content creation and marketing campaigns
- Lead change management initiatives to drive AI adoption across non-technical teams
- Create and deliver training workshops for marketing, product, and creative teams
- Develop prompt engineering best practices and governance frameworks
- Facilitate cross-functional collaboration between technical and business teams

Requirements (Must-haves)
---------------------------
- 5+ years of experience in change management and enablement roles
- Strong background in prompt engineering and LLM application architecture
- Experience designing and delivering workshops for non-technical staff
- Proven track record in digital transformation or AI adoption programs
- Python programming skills for integration and automation tasks
- Experience with agentic workflows and AI orchestration patterns
- Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills

Nice-to-Have
-------------
- Experience in cosmetics, beauty, or CPG industries
- Background in marketing technology or content management systems
- Familiarity with evaluation frameworks and AI observability tools
- Experience with RAG systems and knowledge management

Languages
----------
- English: Business level required
- Japanese: Business level preferred (JLPT N2+)
